# currentIDm

**Instance Property**

The manufacturer identifier for the system currently selected by the reader session.

## Declaration

```swift
var currentIDm: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

The reader session updates [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCFeliCaTag/currentIDm] each time your app calls the [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCFeliCaTag/polling(systemCode:requestCode:timeSlot:completionHandler:)] method. The data contained in [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCFeliCaTag/currentIDm] is empty when the system selection fails.

## Getting Current Information

- **currentSystemCode**: The system code most recently selected by the reader session during a polling sequence.
